Register DOIs automatically

OJS will assign article DOIs automatically with EZID as articles are published. Please note that this may take a short amount of time after publication to process. You can check for all unregistered DOIs in the unregistered articles listing.

This plugin can be configured to automatically register Digital Object Identifiers (DOIs) with EZID. You will need a username and password (available from ezid) in order to do so. If you do not have your own username and password you can still export into the CrossRef XML format, but you cannot register your DOIs with EZID from within OJS.
You can configure the EZID export/registration plug-in here.
Please configure the EZID export/registration plug-in:
Username
Please enter the username you got from EZID (EZID provides an "apitest" account for creating test identifiers only).
Please enter the password you got from EZID (apitest for "apitest" account).
Please enter the username you got from EZID.
Please enter the password you got from EZID.
DOI Shoulder

If you wish to mint new randomly generated DOIs based on an EZID shoulder, please enter the DOI shoulder you got from EZID in the format 10.xxxx/xxx. This will override the DOI Prefix and DOI Suffix settings in the DOI PubId plugin. The shoulder 10.5072/FK2 can be used for test purposes.
